statements: SELECT system_id, surgery_date, surgical_time, surgeon_name FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data WHERE complications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, complications FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data WHERE surgery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT system_id, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data WHERE system_id = 1
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, complications FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data WHERE surgery_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY surgery_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data WHERE complications IS NOT NULL ORDER BY surgery_date, surgeon_name
SELECT patient_id, surgery_date, surgical_time FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data WHERE surgical_time >= '08:00:00' AND surgical_time <= '12:00:00'
SELECT system_id, patient_id, complications FROM robotic_surgical_systems_performance_data WHERE complications LIKE '%infection%' ORDER BY system_id ASC
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems;
SELECT system_name, manufacturer FROM robotic_surgical_systems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT surgeon_name, procedure_type, success_rate FROM performance_data WHERE success_rate > 90;
SELECT installation_date, COUNT(system_id) FROM robotic_surgical_systems GROUP BY installation_date;
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY operation_date ASC, operation_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgical_systems;
SELECT system_id, system_name, manufacturer FROM robotic_surgical_systems WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_id, system_name, installation_date FROM robotic_surgical_systems ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT system_id, manufacturer, installation_date FROM robotic_surgical_systems WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Company' AND installation_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT system_id, system_name, surgeon_name, procedure_type FROM robotic_surgical_systems JOIN performance_data ON robotic_surgical_systems.system_id = performance_data.system_id WHERE performance_data.success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM surgical_systems;
SELECT system_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM surgical_systems;
SELECT system_id, system_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM surgical_systems ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialization FROM surgeons WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT system_name, manufacturer, last_maintenance_date FROM surgical_systems WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT system_name, manufacturer FROM surgical_systems;
SELECT * FROM surgical_operations WHERE operation_type='Knee Replacement' ORDER BY operation_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, purchase_date FROM surgical_systems WHERE manufacturer='ABC Medical' LIMIT 5;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialization, years_of_experience FROM surgeons WHERE specialization='Cardiothoracic';
SELECT operation_type, operation_date, surgeon_name FROM surgical_operations JOIN surgeons ON surgical_operations.surgeon_id = surgeons.surgeon_id ORDER BY operation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_systems;
SELECT system_name, manufacturer FROM robotic_systems WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT procedure_name, category, duration_minutes FROM surgical_procedures ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value, timestamp FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM robotic_systems JOIN maintenance_records ON robotic_systems.system_id = maintenance_records.system_id;
SELECT system_name, manufacturer FROM robotic_systems;
SELECT procedure_name, category, duration_minutes FROM surgical_procedures ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value, timestamp FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 100;
SELECT procedure_name, category, success_rate FROM surgical_procedures WHERE success_rate BETWEEN 0.8 AND 1;
SELECT rs.system_name, mr.maintenance_date, mr.maintenance_type, mr.technician_name FROM robotic_systems rs JOIN maintenance_records mr ON rs.system_id = mr.system_id;
SELECT * FROM surgical_instruments;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type FROM surgical_instruments WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT surgery_date, surgeon_name, surgical_procedure FROM robotic_surgery_performance ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, total_members FROM surgical_team WHERE total_members > 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, metric_date FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 90 ORDER BY metric_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_surgery_performance WHERE surgeon_name='Dr. Smith' AND surgery_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT surgical_procedure, surgeon_name, surgery_date FROM robotic_surgery_performance WHERE average_performance_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY surgery_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, surgical_procedure, surgeon_name FROM robotic_surgery_performance WHERE surgical_procedure LIKE '%knee%' AND surgeon_name='Dr. Johnson' ORDER BY surgery_date ASC;
SELECT team_name, total_members, team_leader FROM surgical_team WHERE total_members >= 10 AND team_name='Orthopedics' ORDER BY total_members DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM surgical_instruments WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
